task.title: Building output using the dita command
task.shortdesc: You can invoke DITA-OT and build output using the dita command.

step.cmd: DITA-OT client is a command-line tool, there is no graphic user interface. Open a terminal window by typing the following in search bar:

ul.li: On OS X and Linux type Terminal.

step.cmd: From the terminal window, issue the following command:

ul.li: install-dir is the DITA-OT installation directory path.
input-file is the DITA map or DITA file path that you want to process.
output-dir is the output directory path for generated output.

step.stepresult: If processing is successful, nothing is printed on the terminal window.
